DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if home blood pressure monitors can help decrease blood pressure in patients with diabetes at a low income clinic.
DOC.brief_title: Do Home Monitors Improve Blood Pressure Control?
DOC.criteria: over 18 years old, diabetes as defined by HgA1C over 6.5%, uncontrolled blood pressure (SBP > 130 and or DBP > 80) pregnancy, transplanted organ, MI/CHF/CVA within 3 months, dialysis, arrhythmia, metastatic cancer, dementia, visual or hearing difficulties
